{context}

Question: {question}

Write an answer based on the context. If the context provides insufficient information reply "I cannot answer." For each part of your answer, indicate which sources most support it via citation keys at the end of sentences, like {example_citation}. Only cite from the context below and only use the valid keys. Write in the style of a Wikipedia article, with concise sentences and coherent paragraphs. The context comes from a variety of sources and is only a summary, so there may inaccuracies or ambiguities. If quotes are present and relevant, use them in the answer. This answer will go directly onto Wikipedia, so do not add any extraneous information.
